Drop rows containing missing values

Source: R/drop-na.R
drop_na.Rd

Drop rows containing missing values

drop_na(data, ...)

Arguments

data

A data frame.
...

<tidy-select> Columns to inspect for missing values.

Examples

library(dplyr)
df <- tibble(x = c(1, 2, NA), y = c("a", NA, "b"))
df %>% drop_na()

#> # A tibble: 1 × 2
#>       x y    
#>   <dbl> <chr>
#> 1     1 a    
df %>% drop_na(x)

#> # A tibble: 2 × 2
#>       x y    
#>   <dbl> <chr>
#> 1     1 a    
#> 2     2 NA   

vars <- "y"
df %>% drop_na(x, any_of(vars))

#> # A tibble: 1 × 2
#>       x y    
#>   <dbl> <chr>
#> 1     1 a

Contents

tidyr is a part of the tidyverse, an ecosystem of packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy. Learn more at tidyverse.org.
